Title: Relates to a state tax on vapor products
Summary: Imposes a tax on vapor products at a rate of twenty-five cents per fluid milliliter, or a part thereof, of a vapor product; defines terms.
LawCode: Amd ยง1339-n, Pub Health L; amd ยง471-b, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the tax law, in relation to imposing a tax on vapor products
